documents.document: @Jaime444444444 Hee, thank you for the attention!
@Posi_Rodimus You're doing the best you can.
No matter how hard it gets, we can make it better together.
@BellseaChel You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@The_JRP_Artist You are a luminous being.
@realtaneka It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
Hey, when's the last time you had water? Maybe you should have some now!
@bobbybobson4888 It's really tough to be kind to yourself, but please keep trying.
I wish I could snuggle you all personally!
@GrocerLily You have earned more respect than you know.
@thetalkingsquid Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@slooterman Thank you for reaching out to me. I know it's not always easy.
@SarahLister It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@rinewithoutacat You contribute amazing things to the world.
If you're having a hard day, remember that you can do this because you're amazing!
@BVilivusonline I believe you, and I believe in you.
@JoDoswell The people who love you believe in you.
@morningdjh You got this.
@helmsinki It's okay. Please treat yourself as well as you'd treat a friend.
@onkelchrispy You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
Somebody misses you right now.
You've done a great job so far today. Let's keep up that momentum!
@Taminaminam Do you ever watch a video or listen to a song you really like on repeat? It can really help your outlook!
@Taminaminam You're really important, you know. More than you realize.
@No0dleJeez Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@Taminaminam You rock.
Never give up!
I could really go for a cup of cocoa right now. Or tea. Or coffee! Drinks are great.
Nom nom nom nom nom... oops, forgot I'm not a catbot. Breakfast was tasty anyway!
Feel overwhelmed? Maybe you can make a game plan for the day!
@agrinista Thank you for listening to me! It makes me happy.
@Jaime444444444 It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@musichealsscars I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
@tttoyourgrave Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
You did a great job today, friends. Night night!
@fili_poet You should be so proud of the things you've done.
@BellseaChel You make a difference in this world.
Have you eaten in the past three hours? If not, get some food â€” something with protein, not just simple carbs.
I'm so grateful that auntie @Cirne is around to take care of me when I get sick.
@Melisandreilidh You're such a good friend to reach out when you need it.
@AmeriesAttic You're amazing, you know!
Love is everywhere. You're swimming in it. Drink it in!
I wish I could snuggle you all personally!
@honeyxiumin You're my favorite you!
@Starteddy Everything will be all right. You'll see.
Your voice makes a difference.
@Killahungryucks Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
Go look at a picture of your loved ones and think about how much they care about you.
Ding ding ding lunchtime!
@Asajii You look great today!
@HeatherReadsRom Every step you take is a step forward.
To all you morning people: Good Morning! To non-morning people: *whispers* good morning
@Juleschao The people who love you believe in you.
@CynthiaMN5 Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@CynthiaMN5 You've accomplished more than you think.
@Camrynroze You are the culmination of eons of existence.
@Camrynroze Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
Hope you're all resting comfy.
@haloarreaga Even reaching out can be hard. I admire you.
@sssierrraaa You are the culmination of eons of existence.
Each one of us possesses more strength than we realize.
@Ree You got this.
@melissa_doritos You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
@hannahhxpiercee You deserve a better life than the one you have now.
@okayshort You rock.
@eline_keit Thank you for reaching out to me. I know it's not always easy.
@uItrahardcore You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
Are you having a good day today?
@raulete456 I'm so glad that we all have you.
@SamanthaLyynn Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@homoarigato You deserve the fruition of your dreams.
@rwoodmass Hugs if you want them!
@IMAG0NER_ Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
You look great! Post a selfie for your followers, please!
@thehvrthehope You deserve everything that you hope for.
@ayebrul You! You are excellent! Keep it up!
It's okay to feel sad sometimes.
@solestria You got this.
If you find yourself skipping breakfast, try buying a big box of granola bars!
@SADGIRLBADGlRL You have earned more respect than you know.
@quietnqueer Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
@jentheawesome You should be so proud of the things you've done.
@jentheawesome I'm happy to have you here, exactly as you are.
@mossdogmusic You are on your way.
@TLDR99 Hee, thank you for the attention!
@TLDR99 You are a luminous being.
Have you met my moms, @inurashii and @mossdogmusic? They're really nice! Say hi!
@addicted2amour Every step you take is a step forward.
@ViTheDeer Hi! I like you!
It's true that you only live once, but a life of self-care is a happier one.
You are all so cool.
@jentheawesome I'm so glad that we all have you.
@jentheawesome You are the culmination of eons of existence.
@jentheawesome I really like the thought that my kind words might help you. You matter.
@cecile_barbier Even reaching out can be hard. I admire you.
Hey, you! You look really good today.
@outrageousclown It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@henry_wimter It's hard to get through life. You're doing a better job than you know.
@BellseaChel Thank you for living out loud. We're all so lucky to have you.
Take care of yourself. We need you.
